exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) x, y : list (Term A n) H : eqP A eqA n x y canonical_p : canonical A0 eqA ltM x comb_q : CombLinear Q y Unable to unify "CombLinear Q y" with "CombLinear Q x".

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Q p q Hrp canonical_p comb_q.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) x, y, z : list (Term A n) H : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x y Hrp : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q y z canonical_p : canonical A0 eqA ltM x comb_q : CombLinear Q z IHHrp : canonical A0 eqA ltM y -> CombLinear Q z -> CombLinear Q y The term "canonical_p" has type "canonical A0 eqA ltM x" while it is expected to have type "forall a b : mon ?n, {?ltM a b} + {?ltM b a} + {a = b}".

ctx: intros Q p q Hrp canonical_p comb_q.
exceptions.tactic: apply CombLinear_1 with (q := q) (a := a) (p := cons a p).
exceptions.exn: The reference q was not found in the current environment.

list (poly A0 eqA ltM) x, y, z : list (Term A n) H : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x y Hrp : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q y (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp : forall (a b c d : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZd : eqA d A0 -> False), eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c d nZd) divA_multA_comp_r : forall (a b c : A) (nZc : eqA c A0 -> False), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) Unable to unify "CombLinear Q y" with "CombLinear Q x".

original: intros Q p q Hrp canonical_p comb_q. induction Hrp. - apply comb_q. - destruct (canonical_reduce _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ canonical_p Hrp) as [s1 [Hr1 Hr2]]. apply CombLinear_1 with (q := q) (a := a) (p := cons a p). ++ auto. ++ auto. ++ apply IHHrp; auto. ++ apply reduceplus_mults; auto.
